thread.title: Confidence in China’s Economy Declines, PBOC Survey Finds
thread.title_full: Confidence in China’s Economy Declines, PBOC Survey Finds - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Confidence in China’s Economy Declines, PBOC Survey Finds
text:
BEIJING—Confidence in the Chinese economy among bankers and entrepreneurs was falling, a central bank survey showed Wednesday, as the world’s No. 2 economy showed more signs of weakness despite the government’s efforts to shore it up.
The index of bankers’ confidence in the economy stood at 40.6% in the third quarter, down by 2.8 percentage... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
